Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Add retro Windows 95-style Cosmic Meatball Portal

Features:
- Windows 95-themed portal with desktop icons and taskbar
- Game Portal window with form submission to Supabase
- My Files folder with game thumbnails and image viewer
- Background music (hacker.mp3) with mute/unmute controls
- Desktop icons: Game Portal, My Files, Music, Network (Instagram link)
- System tray with speaker icon and clock
- Retro animations for window open/close
- Responsive design for desktop and mobile

Frontend: React + Vite with Windows 95 styling
Backend: Express.js + Supabase for lead capture
